DOC.brief_summary: Dietary intervention prevent sarcopenia elderly people . The objective study test whether combine nutrient intake play important role stimulation muscle protein growth elderly people ; whether represent effective strategy overcome impaired muscle protein synthesis elderly compare young subject .
DOC.brief_title: Combined Nutrient Intake Muscle Protein Synthesis
